objects.name: Analytic 1550
objects.description: Adversary adds IDE extensions or plugins (VS Code, JetBrains Toolbox/EAP, Eclipse) via GUI or CLI, possibly via managed profiles. Chain: process start with install/update flags → plist/extension folder changes under ~/Library/Application Support/Code or ~/Library/Application Support/JetBrains → outbound connections to marketplaces/tunnel services → optional helper (ssh/node) spawned.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Execution of Code.app, idea, JetBrainsToolbox, eclipse with install/extension flags

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Writes under ~/Library/Application Support/Code*/extensions or JetBrains plugins

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Outbound connections from IDE processes to marketplace/tunnel domains

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: Per-app preference domains and plugin directories vary by version.
If MDM installs extensions, allowlist those events to avoid FPs.
Correlation range between install and first beacon.
